name: Vivian Harte
what_you_do: I help people become more confident within themselves to make that transformation. Through my online courses, live events, and coaching, I provide powerful strategies for people to foster positive changes within their lives.
who_you_serve: I help people become more confident within themselves to make that transformation.
social_proof: I am the co-author of _Self-Esteem for Dummies_ in the _Dummies_ series. And I have helped over 18,000 people learn and use confidence and assertiveness skills during the past 20 years.
business_focus: Helping people become more confident within themselves to make positive changes in their lives.
